testsuite.name: Test Login Functionality
testsuite.system-out:
Scenario: Successfull Login # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripLogin.feature:4 Given Enter Username and Password # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.enter_username_and_password() When Send Post Request with Valid Endpoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.send_post_request_with_valid_endpoint() Then Validate Statucode Should be 201 # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_statucode_should_be(java.lang.Integer) eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6InNpdmEyMzI1QGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTczMzEzMDc0MiwiZXhwIjoxNzMzMTUyMzQyfQ.MqqXjJcJtLS7XklITVkmubeh4CKjAl7wctIrDpdQf24 And Get the Token details # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.get_the_token_details()
Scenario: Login with Unregistered User # src/test/resources/Funtionaltest/QTripLogin.feature:10 Given Enter Unregistered Username and Password # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.enter_unregistered_username_and_password(io.cucumber.datatable.DataTable) | email | password | | kal235@gmail.com | Test@123 | When Send Post Request with Valid Endpoint # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.send_post_request_with_valid_endpoint() Then Validate Statucode Should be 404 # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_statucode_should_be(java.lang.Integer) {"success":false,"message":"email does not exist"} false And Validate Response Body # cucumberapi.stepDefinitions.Steps.validate_response_body()
